Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the size of the tax cut proposed by the GOP plan, as experts suggest that several past tax bills have resulted in larger tax cuts.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or data to back up the assertion that the GOP plan is the biggest tax cut in U.S. history.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the GOP plan is the biggest tax cut in U.S. history without considering alternative explanations or comparing it to past tax bills.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations or acknowledge that there have been past tax bills that resulted in larger tax cuts.
